rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with a reception area and storage space.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious open-plan living room featuring floor-to-ceiling windows for abundant natural light.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Cozy dining area with a modern Bohemian interior style, integrated into the living space.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Fully equipped kitchen designed in a fusion of contemporary and bohemian style, with ample workspace.

rooms.name: Guest Toilet & Utility
rooms.description: Dedicated guest toilet along with utility storage.

rooms.name: Servants' Quarters
rooms.description: Functional space for household staff designed with basic amenities and privacy.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Largest bedroom with en-suite bathroom and walk-in closet. Positioned in the north-east according to Vastu for positive energy.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Cozy bedroom designed with Bohemian decor and ample light.

rooms.name: Master Bathroom
rooms.description: Luxurious bathroom for the master suite featuring modern fixtures.

rooms.name: Children's Bedrooms
rooms.description: Two children bedrooms arranged on either side of a central corridor.

rooms.name: Additional Bedroom Suite
rooms.description: Bohemian themed bedroom with a private bathroom and closet.

rooms.name: Study/Office
rooms.description: Functional study space designed for work and creativity. Placed to align with Vastu for career growth.

rooms.name: Family Lounge
rooms.description: Informal seating area for family gatherings, incorporating natural elements.

rooms.name: Utility Storage
rooms.description: Additional storage space integrated within the layout.

rooms.name: Swimming Pool
rooms.description: A stylish swimming pool area designed for leisure and relaxation, with surrounding deck space.
